  • Constructor Details

    • ViewModelController

      public ViewModelController()
      Constructs a new ViewModelController object. Initializes the slot manager and loads slot files from the directory.

  • Method Details

    • createModel

      public void createModel​(int type1, int type2, String name1, String name2)
      Creates a new game model with the specified player types and names.
      Specified by:
      createModel in interface ViewModelListener
      Parameters:
      type1 - The type of player 1 (human or AI).
      type2 - The type of player 2 (human or AI).
      name1 - The name of player 1.
      name2 - The name of player 2.

    • getModel

      public QuartoModel getModel()
      Retrieves the current game model.
      Specified by:
      getModel in interface ViewModelListener
      Returns:
      The QuartoModel instance representing the current game state.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame​(String fileName) throws IOException
      Saves the current game state to a file with the specified name.
      Specified by:
      saveGame in interface ViewModelListener
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to save the game state to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while saving the file.

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame​(int index)
      Loads a game state from the slot file with the specified index.
      Specified by:
      loadGame in interface ViewModelListener
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the slot file to load.

    • getSlotFiles

      public List<SlotFile> getSlotFiles()
      Retrieves the list of slot files available for saving and loading game states.
      Specified by:
      getSlotFiles in interface ViewModelListener
      Returns:
      A list of SlotFile objects representing the slot files.

    • clearSlot

      public void clearSlot​(int id)
      Clears the slot file with the specified ID.
      Specified by:
      clearSlot in interface ViewModelListener
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the slot file to clear.

    • playShot

      public void playShot​(int line, int column)
      Plays a shot on the specified line and column.
      Parameters:
      line - the line where the shot is played (0-3)
      column - the column where the shot is played (0-3)

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the last move in the game.

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redoes the previously undone move in the game.

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Checks if it's possible to redo a move in the game.
      Returns:
      true if redo is possible, false otherwise.

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Checks if it's possible to undo a move in the game.
      Returns:
      true if undo is possible, false otherwise.

    • getTable

      public Cell[][] getTable()
      Get the current state of the board.
      Returns:
      A 4x4 matrix of Cells

    • selectPawn

      public void selectPawn​(String pawnStr)
      Selects a pawn based on the provided pawn string representation.
      Parameters:
      pawnStr - The string representation of the pawn to select.

    • getAvailablePawns

      public Pawn[] getAvailablePawns()
      Return all the pawns still available to play.
      Returns:
      An array of Pawns (null if no pawn available at this index)

    • getSelectedPawnStr

      public String getSelectedPawnStr()
      Retrieves the string representation of the currently selected pawn.
      Returns:
      The string representation of the selected pawn, or null if no pawn is selected.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public int getCurrentPlayer()
      Get the current player. 1 for player 1, 2 for player 2.

    • getCurrentPlayerName

      public String getCurrentPlayerName()
      Retrieves the name of the current player.
      Returns:
      The name of the current player, or null if the model is not initialized.

    • getPlayer1Name

      public String getPlayer1Name()
      Retrieves the name of player 1.
      Returns:
      The name of player 1, or null if the model is not initialized.

    • getPlayer2Name

      public String getPlayer2Name()
      Retrieves the name of player 2.
      Returns:
      The name of player 2, or null if the model is not initialized.

    • getPlayer1Type

      public int getPlayer1Type()
      Retrieves the type of player 1.
      Returns:
      The type of player 1, or 0 if the model is not initialized.

    • getPlayer2Type

      public int getPlayer2Type()
      Retrieves the type of player 2.
      Returns:
      The type of player 2, or 0 if the model is not initialized.

    • isPlayer1AI

      public boolean isPlayer1AI()
      Checks if player 1 is controlled by an AI.
      Returns:
      true if player 1 is an AI, false otherwise.

    • isPlayer2AI

      public boolean isPlayer2AI()
      Checks if player 2 is controlled by an AI.
      Returns:
      true if player 2 is an AI, false otherwise.

    • isSelectionPhase

      public boolean isSelectionPhase()
      Checks if the game is in the selection phase.
      Returns:
      true if the game is in the selection phase, false otherwise.

    • isPlayPhase

      public boolean isPlayPhase()
      Checks if the game is in the play phase.
      Returns:
      true if the game is in the play phase, false otherwise.

    • checkWinner

      public boolean checkWinner​(int line, int column)
      Checks if the game is won by the player at the specified line and column.
      Parameters:
      line - the line index of the selected position
      column - the column index of the selected position
      Returns:
      true if the game is won, false otherwise

    • isCurrentPlayerAI

      public boolean isCurrentPlayerAI()
      Determines if it is the AI's turn to play.
      Returns:
      true if it is the AI's turn, false otherwise

    • isGameWon

      public boolean isGameWon()
      Return true if the game is over because of a win.

    • isGameDraw

      public boolean isGameDraw()
      Return true if the game is over because of a draw.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Return true if the game is over.
